casebody.data:
Jean ST. JUSTE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 26, 2018

The petitioner Jean St. Juste's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 183 Conn.App. 471, 193 A.3d 117 (2018), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
